name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2
description:
FASTER, TOUGHER, BIGGER AND BETTER

The highest rated football game returns with hundreds of new additions and updates:
54 national squads, 32 club sides
New updated statistics make for a more realistic football simulation
The most realistic game physics ever seen, as players react and adjust to every situation
Use dummies, feints and tricks to leave defenders in your wake
*Friendlies, cup competitions and the ability to create your own dream team in the Master League

IF FOOTBALL IS YOUR ONLY RELIGION, WORSHIP AT THE ULTIMATE ALTAR
